title: Council Decision of 29 November 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 November 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (93/C 336/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/434/EEC of 16 September 1985 setting up an Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas by Decision of 30 June 1992 (2) the Council appointed Dr Karl-Heinz FROEMMING an alternate member for the period ending on 29 June 1995;
Whereas the German Government has nominated Dr Bernhard UNTERHALT to replace Dr Karl-Heinz FROEMMING,
main_body: Dr Bernhard UNTERHALT is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Dr Karl-Heinz FROEMMING for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 29 June 1995.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 November 1993.
For the Council
The President
G. COEME
(1) OJ No L 253, 24. 9. 1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ No C 208, 15. 8. 1992, p. 2.
